Subject: Re: Condor's attempt to escape.
From: Robert Dahl <rdahl@...>

Condor was just bellow a group of robots talking, he could barely make out
what they were saying, and from the hum of energy, he could guess it was
the main computer room. He could follow the vent either to his right or to
his left.
